name: customizing-bootstrap
description: - Your are going to modify **Bootstrap 5.3.3** using **NPM** by customizing at least **10 variables each** and working collaboratively and build a fully customized homepage. - For the fully customized homepage, make sure you have a wireframe to present and apply __*60-3-10 rule*__, __*principles of design*__, __*typography*__, and __*color theory*__.
